Detailed Description

Holds the internal details of an xint::integer.

The data for an integer is stored in a separate struct so it can be shared between different copies of an identical number.

void boost::xint::detail::data_t::skipLeadingZeros (  ) 

Call this after every manipulation of a data_t object that could possibly leave leading zeros in the integer.
